attributes.action: Get Pete Rowe flown home from Greece by air ambulance asap
attributes.additional_details:
Mr Rowe has medical evidence to support the request to be flown back to the UK by air ambulance..
we pay insurance to cover all scenarios holiday .. but when it comes to it they refuse to pay what the cover is for... his wife Lisa and his kids are being put through hell as a result of all the delays and the insurers not agreeing to the medical specialists requests....and this poor man needs to be at hospital in Lincoln near home and family ... please help
.. share and sign this petition to #GetPeteHome
attributes.background: Pete Rowe from Lincoln UK was admitted to hospital in greece over a month (9th October) ago with respiratory failure.his insurance company are refusing to pay the £19,000 to get him air ambulanced back to the UK for further treatment which has had a massive impact on his mental &physical health

rejection.details:
Your petition seems to be calling on an insurance company, not the UK Government or Parliament, to take action.

You can find out how to get assistance from the UK Government for British citizens in Greece here:

https://www.gov.uk/world/organisations/british-embassy-athens
